keyMoments.title: Door Door Fruit Revealed
keyMoments.description: Blueno demonstrates his Doa Doa no Mi powers by creating a door through a solid wall directly into Iceburg's room, revealing his Devil Fruit ability for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Blueno's unique Paramecia ability that allows him to create doors on any surface, establishing him as a formidable CP9 agent.
keyMoments.quote: It's because of the Door Door Fruit.

keyMoments.title: Blueno Shoots Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Blueno shoots Iceburg to weaken him, explaining they cannot kill him until they receive the signal, then leaves him with Robin while handling the guards.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Blueno's ruthless efficiency and CP9's tactical coordination in their operation.
keyMoments.quote: We cannot kill him until we get the signal.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Galley-La Shipwrights
keyMoments.description: Blueno effortlessly defeats multiple shipwrights who attempt to stop the masked infiltrators.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the vast power gap between CP9 agents and ordinary fighters.

abilities.description: Allows the user to create doors on any surface, including walls, floors, and even air itself, leading to another dimension.

relationships.description: Blueno operated undercover in Water 7 for five years before revealing himself and shooting Iceburg during the CP9 raid.

evolutionMoments.description: Blueno shoots Iceburg and reveals the CP9 conspiracy.

reveals.information: Possesses the Doa Doa no Mi (Door Door Fruit)
Revealed to be a CP9 agent working undercover as a bartender

keyMoments.title: Geppo Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Kalifa displays the Rokushiki technique Geppo (Moonwalk), showing incredible speed and the ability to jump while airborne, shocking the shipwrights.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Rokushiki techniques by CP9 in this arc, establishing their superhuman martial arts abilities.

keyMoments.title: Ibara Road Revealed
keyMoments.description: Kalifa uses her signature technique Ibara Road (Thorny Road), leaping into the air and using her whip to defeat multiple shipwrights simultaneously.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Kalifa's combat style and signature weapon technique.

abilities.description: One of the six Rokushiki techniques that allows the user to kick off the air itself to jump in mid-air.
Kalifa leaps in the air and thrusts her whip out to decimate a group of people.

relationships.description: Kalifa worked as Iceburg's secretary for five years as part of CP9's undercover mission before revealing her true allegiance.

evolutionMoments.description: Kalifa participates in the CP9 raid on Galley-La, betraying her position as Iceburg's secretary.

reveals.information: Master of Rokushiki techniques including Geppo
Revealed to be a CP9 agent disguised as Iceburg's secretary

keyMoments.title: Reveals CP9 Conspiracy to Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Robin reveals to Iceburg that she and CP9 deliberately framed the Straw Hat Pirates, and their true objective is obtaining the Pluton blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Major plot revelation that exposes the conspiracy and establishes the conflict's true stakes.
keyMoments.quote: We purposely placed the blame on the pirates. Our true aim is the blueprints you would have passed down to Paulie.

keyMoments.title: Robin Defeats Shipwrights
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi powers to defeat multiple Galley-La shipwrights during the infiltration.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's continued cooperation with CP9, deepening the mystery of her betrayal.

relationships.description: Robin cooperates with Blueno and other CP9 agents during the Galley-La raid, though her true motivations remain hidden.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin works alongside Blueno to confront Iceburg about the Pluton blueprints.

reveals.information: Working with CP9 to obtain the Pluton blueprints and framed the Straw Hats

keyMoments.title: Learns Truth About CP9 Conspiracy
keyMoments.description: Iceburg discovers that Robin and CP9 deliberately framed the Straw Hats and are after the Pluton blueprints he possesses.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Iceburg's knowledge of and connection to the ancient weapon Pluton.

keyMoments.title: Shot by Blueno
keyMoments.description: Iceburg is shot by Blueno to weaken him, though CP9 needs him alive temporarily to extract information about the blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the danger to Iceburg and demonstrates CP9's ruthlessness.

relationships.description: Iceburg is betrayed and shot by Blueno, who had been operating undercover in Water 7 for five years.

evolutionMoments.description: Blueno reveals his true identity and shoots Iceburg.

reveals.information: Possesses knowledge of the Pluton blueprints location
Was targeted by CP9's five-year undercover operation

keyMoments.title: Lucci Remains Outside During Attack
keyMoments.description: Unlike other shipwrights who rush to investigate, Lucci and Kaku choose to sit just outside Iceburg's door, maintaining their cover.
keyMoments.significance: Subtle foreshadowing of Lucci's true identity as a CP9 agent through his suspicious behavior.

keyMoments.title: Kaku Remains Outside During Attack
keyMoments.description: Kaku attempts to stop Tilestone and Lulu from leaving their posts but then chooses to sit outside with Lucci rather than investigate the attack.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows Kaku's true identity as a CP9 agent through his unusual behavior.
